topic.name: Credits
topic.content:
Stratos v0.7 (Beta)
Primary Development and Concept: Morgan Allen Additional Programming: Jaroslaw Piotrowski (Kerai) Additional Models and Animation: Pawel Piotrowski (Gorion) Additional Testing: Peter Duggan, plus Sunil, Akash and Dmitri at Ubertesters Additional Advice: Java Gaming Forums, Tynan Sylvester and the family
